items.title: Air strike kills senior Hamas official in Gaza
items.description: Salah al-Bardaweel and his wife died in the southern city of Khan Younis, a Hamas source told the BBC.

items.title: Are Nigerians abroad widening the class divide back home?
items.description: Some locals find they cannot compete with those holidaying from the diaspora who are nicknamed I Just Got Back.

items.title: Fear and anger mount as 'battle for the soul of Romanian democracy' looms
items.description: Their last vote was cancelled due to alleged Russian meddling. Now Romanians fear what might happen in May.

items.title: 'Wonderful teenagers helped my son on Halloween': Readers recall kindness of strangers
items.description: BBC News told of kind acts following UN report that found strangers' helpfulness was underestimated.

items.title: 'My husband is a fighter pilot in Ukraine. Here's how I really feel about a ceasefire'
items.description: Maria, whose husband Ivan has been risking his life since the first day of the war, is cautiously hoping for a truce.
